医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
儿童“尼曼-皮克C型”机制的新见解在《科学转化医学》杂志上，DZNE 和 LMU 医院的科学家报告了对“尼曼-匹克 C 型”(NPC) 机制的新见解，这是一种与痴呆症相关的罕见神经退行性疾病，早在儿童时期就可能出现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-insights-into-the-mechanisms-of-Niemann-Pick-type-C-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-insights-into-the-mechanisms-of-Niemann-Pick-type-C-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1abf6fa6-5c26-48ad-b1c8-102a561c3199 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:54:00 -0500 New insights into the mechanisms of "Niemann-Pick type C" in children
双抗体疗法在治疗转移性结直肠癌方面显示出希望转移性结直肠癌（mCRC）仍然是一个艰巨的挑战，尤其是在一线治疗失败后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Dual-antibody-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-metastatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Dual-antibody-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-metastatic-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=32bacad5-226f-4878-a795-186024ed4313 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:46:00 -0500 Dual-antibody therapy shows promise in treating metastatic colorectal cancer
研究发现邻里劣势会影响血压和认知能力维克森林大学医学院的新研究表明，生活在贫困社区与血压升高和认知得分较低有关，即使对于没有轻度认知障碍诊断的人也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Neighborhood-disadvantage-found-to-affect-blood-Pressure-and-cognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Neighborhood-disadvantage-found-to-affect-blood-Pressure-and-cognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3851f342-deb6-488f-9afe-b2accc59be8c Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:39:00 -0500 Neighborhood disadvantage found to affect blood pressure and cognition
新技术引导免疫细胞对抗脑癌和多发性硬化症研究人员找到了一种对免疫细胞进行编程来攻击胶质母细胞瘤并治疗小鼠多发性硬化症炎症的方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-technology-guides-immune-cells-to-fight-brain-cancer-and-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-technology-guides-immune-cells-to-fight-brain-cancer-and-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87a826dd-9424-49d6-bb81-79a314eae6ac Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:30:00 -0500 New technology guides immune cells to fight brain cancer and multiple sclerosis
美国寻求庇护者报告压力很大并出现心血管疾病症状威尔康奈尔医学研究人员表示，许多在美国寻求庇护的人表现出与心血管疾病迹象相关的压力和疼痛症状增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Asylum-seekers-in-the-US-report-high-levels-of-stress-and-cardioangio-disease-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Asylum-seekers-in-the-US-report-high-levels-of-stress-and-cardioangio-disease-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e62b7ef-373c-4375-a069-f950ebc821bf Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:23:00 -0500 Asylum seekers in the U. S. report high levels of stress and cardiovascular disease symptoms
旁遮普省的秸秆焚烧与健康问题和高昂的家庭成本有关旁遮普邦是印度焚烧秸秆的中心。尽管大多数居民都意识到燃烧农作物废弃物的有害影响，但这种做法仍然很普遍，对健康、家庭支出和环境造成严重后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Stubble-burning-in-Punjab-linked-to-health-problems-and-high-household-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/Stubble-burning-in-Punjab-linked-to-health-problems-and-high-household-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3070377e-16ac-494e-92ce-3881e1ca4d8a Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:15:00 -0500 Stubble burning in Punjab linked to health problems and high household costs
新的 Marie Skłodowska-Curie 博士网络推进帕金森病的人工智能解决方案神经系统疾病现在是全世界残疾的主要原因。帕金森病是第二常见的神经退行性疾病，病例数量正在迅速增长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-Marie-Skc582odowska-Curie-Doctoral-Network-advances-AI-solutions-for-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-Marie-Skc582odowska-Curie-Doctoral-Network-advances-AI-solutions-for-Parkinsone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e4c1596-ff34-48cc-b3ed-b89eafc95e50 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 15:05:00 -0500 New Marie Skłodowska-Curie Doctoral Network advances AI solutions for Parkinson’s disease
新化合物 HPH-15 为糖尿病药物提供了有前途的替代品熊本大学科学家推出了一种新型化合物HPH-15，具有降低血糖水平和对抗脂肪堆积的双重功效，标志着糖尿病治疗创新的重大飞跃。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-compound-HPH-15-offers-promising-alternative-to-diabetes-medications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/New-compound-HPH-15-offers-promising-alternative-to-diabetes-medications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87dbe557-73b8-467b-962b-80b088af5717 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 14:58:00 -0500 New compound HPH-15 offers promising alternative to diabetes medications
基于 MRI 的成像技术可预测卵巢癌对治疗的反应剑桥大学开发的一种基于 MRI 的成像技术可以预测卵巢癌肿瘤对治疗的反应，并在患者来源的细胞模型中快速揭示治疗的效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/MRI-based-imaging-technique-predicts-the-response-of-ovarian-cancer-to-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/MRI-based-imaging-technique-predicts-the-response-of-ovarian-cancer-to-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e9c6e7b-1c6d-44d3-aa14-5b313a9cb481 Fri, 06 Dec 2024 14:50:00 -0500 MRI-based imaging technique predicts the response of ovarian cancer to treatment
国际专家制定微生物群诊断框架肠道微生物群也许有一天会成为许多疾病早期诊断和指导治疗的常规工具，但目前缺乏坚实的科学证据来支持这些说法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/International-experts-set-framework-for-microbiota-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241206/International-experts-set-framework-for-microbiota-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa80ebbe-c010-49b0-8f1c-7c4aaa8f2eeb Fri, 06 Dec 2024 14:42:00 -0500 International experts set framework for microbiota diagnostics
